did.head: Overview of the Collection

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives & Special Collections at the Thomas J. Dodd Research Center.

did.unittitle: University of Connecticut, President's Office Records [Edwin O. Smith, 1908]
did.abstract: Edwin O. Smith served as acting President of the Connecticut Agricultural College from April - September 1908. The one folder of correspondence pertains to the dual-job amendment before the Connecticut General Assembly in the late 1950s.

bioghist.head: Biography
bioghist.p: Edwin Oscar Smith served as acting President of the Connecticut Agricultural College from April - September 1908 between the departure of Rufus W. Stimson and the arrival of Charles L. Beach.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains one folder of correspondence pertaining to the dual-job amendment under discussion in the Connecticut General Assembly in the late 1950s.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Archives & Special Collections has a substantial collection of materials pertaining to the University, its history, administration, faculty, staff and students. For detailed information on these collections please contact the curator or ask at the reference desk.
